cleaned_text: The Healing Power of Planetary Metals in Anthroposophic and Homeopathic Medicine Quick Look - Draws out the characteristics of each metal, based on fairy tale principles - Considers the role of imagination in healing - Focus on spiritual processes rather than chemical reactions Examines the character of seven different metals and their relationship to human disease. Description Anthroposophical remedies focus on spiritual processes and relationships between elements, rather than chemical reactions. Henning Schramm argues that principles and ideas drawn from fairy tales can help us understand how remedies involving metals actually work. Henning draws out the character of each metal to reveal its connection to human beings and human disease. He also considers the role of imagination in the healing process. This is a unique approach to the holistic action of metals in therapy. Author Dr Henning Schramm (1942-) was born in Hamburg, Germany. Since 2008 he has worked at a cancer research institute, investing mistletoe therapy. For thirty years, he worked for a pharmaceutical company. He is the author of two other books on natural medicine (in German).
